mapper.select: SELECT A.id AS approval_id , A.approval_code AS approval_code , A.title as title , A.content as conent , A.ref_code as ref_doc_code , LEFT(A.ref_code, 2) AS ref_doc_type , A.drafted_at AS drafted_at , A.status AS status , A.completed_at AS completed_at , A.total_line AS total_line , C.id AS drafter_id , C.name AS drafter_name , D.dept_name AS drafter_department , C.position_code AS drafter_position_code , C.rank_code AS drafter_rank_code , B.id AS approval_attachment_id , B.name AS approval_attachment_name , B.url AS approval_attachment_url , E.id AS approval_line_id , E.approver_id AS approver_id , F.name AS approver_name , G.dept_name AS approver_department , F.position_code AS approver_position_code , F.rank_code AS approver_rank_code , E.sequence AS sequence , E.status AS staus , E.line_type AS line_type , E.note AS note , E.viewed_at AS viewed_at , E.processed_at AS processed_at FROM approval A LEFT JOIN approval_attachment B ON A.id = B.approval_id JOIN employee C ON A.drafter_id = C.id JOIN department D ON C.dept_id = D.id LEFT JOIN approval_line E ON A.id = E.approval_id JOIN employee F ON E.approver_id = F.id JOIN department G ON F.dept_id = G.id WHERE A.id = #{approvalId}

SELECT B.id FROM approval A
JOIN sales_order B ON A.ref_code = B.so_code
JOIN production_request B ON A.ref_code = B.pr_code
JOIN goods_issue B ON A.ref_code = B.gi_code
A.ref_code = #{refDocCode}
